recipes.title: Spaghetti Carbonara
recipes.description: A classic Italian pasta dish with a creamy egg sauce.

recipes.title: Chicken Caesar Salad
recipes.description: Crisp romaine lettuce tossed with traditional Caesar dressing, grilled chicken, and croutons.

recipes.title: Beef Bourguignon
recipes.description: A French stew made with beef braised in red wine and beef broth, flavored with carrots, onions, garlic, and a bouquet garni, and garnished with mushrooms and pearl onions.

recipes.title: Quiche Lorraine
recipes.description: A savory pie from the Lorraine region of France with a pastry crust filled with eggs, cream, and smoked bacon.

recipes.title: Lamb Rogan Josh
recipes.description: Aromatic Kashmiri dish known for its vibrant red color with tender lamb cooked in a spiced gravy.

recipes.title: Pad Thai
recipes.description: A famous Thai noodle dish with stir-fried rice noodles, eggs, tofu, shrimp, and flavored with tamarind pulp, fish sauce, garlic, red chili pepper, and palm sugar, garnished with roasted peanuts.

recipes.title: Fish Tacos
recipes.description: Lightly battered fish served on a soft tortilla with shredded cabbage, a zesty white sauce, and a squeeze of fresh lime.

recipes.title: Mushroom Risotto
recipes.description: A creamy Italian rice dish cooked with a variety of mushrooms and parmesan cheese.

recipes.title: Pumpkin Soup
recipes.description: A creamy, seasonal soup made with pureed pumpkin and a blend of warm spices.

recipes.title: Apple Galette
recipes.description: This simple yet delicious apple galette recipe celebrates seasonal apples with a flaky crust and a hint of cinnamon.

recipes.title: Roast Chicken
recipes.description: Juicy and flavorful roast chicken, perfect for a hearty dinner.

recipes.title: Strawberry Shortcake
recipes.description: Fluffy and buttery shortcakes topped with fresh strawberries and whipped cream.

recipes.title: Spring Pea Risotto
recipes.description: Creamy and flavorful risotto featuring fresh spring peas, perfect for a light and fresh meal.

recipes.title: Corn Pancakes
recipes.description: Fluffy corn pancakes perfect for breakfast or brunch.

recipes.title: Chicken Andouille Gumbo
recipes.description: A rich, flavorful, and spicy soup made with chicken, andouille sausage, and plenty of vegetables and spices.

recipes.title: Beef Wellington
recipes.description: A classic French dish made of beef tenderloin wrapped in puff pastry, served with mushroom duxelle and a side of vegetables.
